pages.text: Tater tots are extremely, EXTREMELY difficult to create. This is one of the final goals you should complete, possibly behind The Bucket. Creating tater tots requires one potato and one $(l:randomcrap:basic_items/animal_fat)Animal Fat$().

Place the animal fat in the empty cauldron, then right click the filled cauldron with a potato to create a tater tot. Tater tots grant Speed 3, Resistance 10, Strength 10, and Absorption 10, as well as fully restore all hunger and saturation.
